title: 想送呢首歌俾各位 jojo part5 ending 2

replies.msg:
https://youtu.be/6NPyYNFfvVk

Don't look back
莫回首
The time has come
起義時刻已經到來
All the pain turns into love
所有折磨將轉為狂喜
We're not submissive, we're not aggressive
我們不卑躬屈膝；也不咄咄逼人
But they think we can't defend
他們卻視我們如手無寸鐵
Stand up, join us, modern crusaders alive
來吧，加入我們的行列，現代十字軍昂然
We have the power to face the future
我們有能耐來面對未來
Cause we are the fighters
就因我們是鬥士
Just fighting for our rights
只為了公理奮戰

They're accusing, like always without knowing
他們不斷地指責，故作蒙昧的如同
What is just fiction or what is the truth
分不清虛假與真實。
They have no mission, they have no passion
他們既不具使命，也毫無熱情
But they dare to tell us what's bad and what's good!
卻膽敢指點吾輩好與壞!
Stand up, join us, modern crusaders alive
奮起吧，加入我們，改革由我們而起
We have the power who'll face the future
身懷絕技的我們正面未來
Cause we are the fighters
就因我們是戰士
Just fighting for our fights
只為了自己的戰鬥而戰

Est affectus
Et defectus
Semper in angaria.
Quod per sortem
Sternit fortem,
Mecum omnes plangite!
Nunc obdurat
被追擊、打壓，終身受到奴役，命運將勇者擊倒！
讓我們為他哭嚎。

Et tunc curat
Ludo mentis aciem,
Egestatem,
Potestatem
交織苦難與幸褔；無論貧賤與富貴。

Stand up, join us, modern crusaders alive
奮起吧，加入我們的行列，改革由我們而起。
We have the power who'll face the future
我們有能力能正視未來
Cause we are the fighters
就因我們是戰士
Just fighting for our fights
只為了自己的戰鬥而拚搏
Stand up, join us, modern crusaders alive!
奮起吧，加入我們，現代十字軍屹立！

唔好意思，借一借位～

大家今日出街一定要帶哨子，長遮！
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區

直頭可以做我地嘅主題曲
